S.FORM: Dave Batton sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1956, byacing te 3 ru 26 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Maryland, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 208 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 109 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 1978 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu New Jersey Nets. pincyuwagan nya' cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Dave Batton sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas te 1956, byacing te 3 ro 26 ryax qo hintgan nya, kinholan nya ga Maryland, hiya ga mnanak na ppzoy mari waya, ro sqoliq ka ppkal mari waya. 208 konbon kinwagiq nya, 109 konkin kin'sow nya, hiya ga qotox nqo spzyang blaq na ppzoy mari NBA. kawas 1978 mnwayaw ppzoy mari ga, mzyop sqo te qotox lahoy ro te magal sqoliq, galon nqo New Jersey Nets. pincyowagan nya' cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
